Sentencas: Fuel cells have been widely studied in the past decades due to their high energy conversion efficiency and low-carbon emissions.
Titulo: Control system design for micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) work at a high-temperature range, allowing the use of several types of fuels such as natural gas or methane.
Titulo: Control system design for micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, in operation, too high a fuel utilization (FU) leads to a large internal temperature gradient, thus the thermal shock of ceramic cracking; while a very low-FU results in carbon deposition and thus a decrease in the overall efficiency.
Titulo: Control system design for micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, a control system was designed for a small-scale micro-tubular SOFC (m-SOFC) stack by employing the National Instruments (TM) Labview Programme and Data acquisition (DAQ) 6009 as well as related electronic components which enabled the control of the fuel flow rate for the stack and the temperature inside the furnace.
Titulo: Control system design for micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results showed that a well designed control system can not only improve the overall efficiency but also extend the working life, finally achieving a more economical m-SOFC system.
Titulo: Control system design for micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells
